page.title: 08A Day in the life of Matthew
page.content: { }On 11th.June,1985 I got up at 7.00am washed,dressed,had breakfast (cereal,toast,cup of tea).Next I gave some tripe and dog biscuits to our 5 Samoyed dogs. At 8.20am mum drove me 3 miles to school where I played until registration time at 8.55am I went to school assembly and then did maths until playtime at 10.30am .I had my dinner at school (turkey,stuffing,cauliflower,potatoes, gravy and cake). Playtime in the afternoon was at 2.30pm. Mum collected me from school at 3.40pm and took me for a haircut. Back at home I chopped wood, had tea, made a wooden sword and shield,played my electronic organ then had supper,watched television and went to bed at 8.00pm.
